Jx.Field.Button

Extends: Jx.Field

This class represents a button.

Example

Summary
Jx.Field.ButtonExtends: Jx.Field
Options
buttonClasschoose the actual Jx.Button subclass to create for this form field. 
buttonOptions
templateThe template used to render this field



Options



buttonClass
choose the actual Jx.Button subclass to create for this form field.   The default is to create a basic Jx.Button.   To create a different kind of button, pass the class to this option, for instance:
buttonClass: Jx.Button.Color



buttonOptions



template
The template used to render this field









Extends: Jx.Widget
